short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your chat experience with advanced filters and automated sending!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ¤– This is a Bot designed to make it easier to send messages in large quantities. It has several filters that help you send your messages to the right target audience, as well as saving your personalized messages for later use!
ðŸ“¢ With the bot you will have access to any server and can use it on any account you want. To activate the Bot on another account or server, just need to enter your Username and Vitalicy Key if you have one. The number of messages that you have will be the same in any account you access.

For a *Trial* test contact us: gldbotsuport@gmail.com
